interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband
Review Date: 2022/11/18
Store: New Balance
Product Description: ['New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband is engineered with comfort and performance in mind. The unique 3D stretch fabric blend allows for total freedom of movement while moving moisture away from the skin quickly for fast drying. These performance accessories feature our New Balance dry and New Balance fresh technology and is your new go-to accessory for any activity.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Item Package Dimensions L x W x H': '12.01 x 4.29 x 0.55 inches', 'Package Weight': '0.04 Kilograms', 'Brand Name': 'New Balance', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Manufacturer': 'Terramar Sports', 'Size': 'One Size', 'Sport Type': 'Cycling, Skiing, Climbing, Running', 'Date First Available': 'December 18, 2019', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Fabric Type': 'polyester,polyester blend'}
Review Text: Good fit. Great color. Not too warm so I would not recommend this to be worn on a winter run.
Review Title: Good fit!
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
13X6 Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Pre Plucked With Baby Hair Brazilian Virgin Hair Kinky Straight Human Hair Wigs For Women Deep Part Space 13 By 6 Wigs Wet And Wavy 100% Human Hair 9A Grade 20 Inch Isufer {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'Isufer', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 6.85 x 0.94 inches; 12.35 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:3de2bb88b3773ef8a1507ffa36dfd57c]] This whole wig is a scam. I’m really trying to understand where all of these great reviews came from.
This is worth Nowhere near the amount of money that I paid for this. The hairline was not pre-plucked, the knots were not bleached, and the frontal part is not the same length as the rest of the hair. I ordered a 20 inch and the frontal part is maybe 10 inches long.
I have included pictures. This will be going back today. So disappointed Persephone Curly Headband Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs for Black Women Natural Color 8 Inch Persephone ['Persephone Curly Headband Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs for Black Women Natural Color 8 Inch'] {'Color': 'curly headband', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'Persephone', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.7 x 9.1 x 1.4 inches; 6.07 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:d0c52af0efb43e01223c088eae46c351]] This is definitely a wig that you will have to play with to get it where you want it. But no complaints for me. No weird smell and the hair curls nicely. It’s cute but you have to play with it… LVWIGXE Short Wigs China Virgin Hair with Baby Hair 13X4X1 T Part Hairline Silky Straight Bob Wigs for Black Women 180% Density Lace Front Wigs Human Hair 14 Inch, Orange (T Part ) Lvwigxe {'Color': 'Orange', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Lvwigxe', 'Package Dimensions': '13.35 x 8.15 x 2.2 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Lvwigxe'} I’m pleasantly surprised with this wig. It’s soft, doesn’t shed, and is exactly as described. There are some short hairs in the way but it’s nothing major. The lace is not harsh at all. If you’re into colored hair, I would definitely recommend this. It’s cute… ZILING Body Wave 13x4 Lace Front Wigs Human Hair for Black Women Pre Plucked with Baby Hair 150% Density Brazilian Body Wave Human Hair Lace Front Wigs 16 Inch ZILING {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'ZILING', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 9.76 x 1.65 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} It’s a nice wig for the most part. The hair doesn’t fall the same way it does in the pictures. Also the knots are very big on this unit. They look like ants to be honest. It is not preplucked. Basic unit…nothing that stands out YILITE Blue Tape in Hair Extensions Human Hair 10pcs 20g Tape in Human Hair Extensions Blue Tape Hair Extensions 14 inches YILITE {'Brand': 'YILITE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 2.64 x 0.59 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '737353301699'} [[VIDEOID:a60247ffbd9b2dafeea155a50c4972d7]] They pulled off the greatest heist with this one. 😂
This is not the same color that is posted. Do not waste your money.

Update: The seller updated the color. If you look at my video, the color that was posted was a dark blue. After my review, they updated the color to show light blue. Not the same color. I wouldn’t buy it 13x6 Straight Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Pre Plucked Bleached Knots HD Transparent Human Hair Lace Front Wigs 160% Density Glueless Lace Frontal Human Hair Wigs for Women Natural Hairline (18 Inch) Gelbive {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Gelbive', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.28 x 10.91 x 3.07 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '746555819598'} [[VIDEOID:84b767f90d17c2a1b68e9f37f8dbc402]] It has potential but it depends on how you are with wigs. Straight out of the pack, it looks really nice. It had great parting space . Once I started combing through it, I realized that the hair on the lace part is shorter than the rest of the hair. Because of that, it makes the hair look very damaged. It has a ton of short hairs. You cannot straighten those to look smooth. Even with a wax stick, it didn’t help them. Not the best 13x4 Body Wave HD Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Wigs for Black Women Pre Plucked with Baby Hair 180% Density Natural Hairline Body Wave Transparent Lace Frontal Wigs Natural Color (18 Inch, natural color) GRACE PLUS {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'GRACE PLUS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.31 x 8.15 x 3.43 inches; 9.91 Ounces'} Sheds way too much. Throwing away Sheds terrible Bob Wig Human Hair Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Bob Wigs for Black Women 10 Inch Bob 13X4 Lace Frontal Wigs Human Hair 150% Density Pre Plucked Natural Color Funky girl {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'Funky girl', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 9.65 x 2.4 inches; 7.37 Ounces'} Turned out better than the other ones I reviewed. Very soft and well constructed. Would recommend! Very pretty MilyBest Fluffy Lashes False Eyelashes Natural Look Cat Eye Lashes, Dramatic Faux Mink Lashes 3D Effect 18mm D Curl Volume Extension Reusable Wispy Lashes Pack 10 Pairs MilyBest {'Color': 'B-Sweet Date | 18MM', 'Brand': 'MilyBest', 'Material': 'Faux Mink, Plastic, Cotton', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'QC10-T02', 'Manufacturer': 'MilyBest', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} These eyelashes are everything!!! The best! MilyBest Fluffy Lashes False Eyelashes Natural Look Cat Eye Lashes, Dramatic Faux Mink Lashes 3D Effect 18mm D Curl Volume Extension Reusable Wispy Lashes Pack 10 Pairs MilyBest {'Color': 'B-Sweet Date | 18MM', 'Brand': 'MilyBest', 'Material': 'Faux Mink, Plastic, Cotton', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'QC10-T02', 'Manufacturer': 'MilyBest', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} These are cute lashes. Great for those on a budget. Cute New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband New Balance ['New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband is engineered with comfort and performance in mind. The unique 3D stretch fabric blend allows for total freedom of movement while moving moisture away from the skin quickly for fast drying. These performance accessories feature our New Balance dry and New Balance fresh technology and is your new go-to accessory for any activity.'] {'Item Package Dimensions L x W x H': '12.01 x 4.29 x 0.55 inches', 'Package Weight': '0.04 Kilograms', 'Brand Name': 'New Balance', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Manufacturer': 'Terramar Sports', 'Size': 'One Size', 'Sport Type': 'Cycling, Skiing, Climbing, Running', 'Date First Available': 'December 18, 2019', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Fabric Type': 'polyester,polyester blend'} Good fit. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user has expanded their interest to include performance accessories such as headbands, in addition to their established focus on beauty accessories like false eyelashes and high-quality wigs. They continue to value products that enhance their aesthetic while providing practical benefits.

- **Quality Expectation:** Their commitment to high standards persists, as they seek reliable performance and durability across all products, including fitness apparel. The user remains enthusiastic about discovering new items that meet these expectations.

- **Adaptability:** The user demonstrates a growing openness to exploring a diverse range of products, including those in the athletic category, while maintaining their strict quality criteria. 

- **Attention to Detail:** Their meticulous nature is evident across all purchases, leading them to appreciate well-crafted items that offer both functionality and style, regardless of the category.

- **Value Perception:** They combine satisfaction with constructive critique, assessing quality, comfort, and performance in all product reviews, whether related to beauty or athletic wear.

- **Communication Style:** The user articulates their experiences clearly, focusing on noteworthy features and engaging positively with the community. Their feedback reflects a balanced perspective on the design and utility of the products they evaluate.

Overall, the user exemplifies a discerning consumer committed to high standards across various aspects of their lifestyle, recognizing the importance of functionality and authenticity in every purchase.
